law.text: A retiree of the State Police Retirement System who is rehired on a permanent, temporary, or contractual basis may not be rehired within 45 days of the date the individual retired if the individual's current employer is any unit of State government and the individual's employer at the time of the individual's last separation from employment with the State before the individual commenced receiving a service retirement allowance was also a unit of State government.
